page.title: 11Shiskine Fire Brigade
page.content: {Shiskine Fire Brigade serves Shiskine, {Blackwaterfoot,Kilpatrick and Torbeg. They used to have a Landrover which was able to carry water.They got a new Ford van which cannot carry water. The members feel they would rather have the old Landrover back as it was more efficient than the Ford van. There are round about eight men in the Shiskine Brigade.The men in the fire brigade do not carry bleepers around with them. There is a hotel that has a siren that tells the firemen when there is a fire,a hidden button is pressed to make the siren go off. Shiskine fire brigade have had their new Ford van for two years.When there is a fire they can't go right up to the fire with the Ford van but,with the Landrover they could get right up to it.That is why more people like it. {
